thread.section_title: eTurboNews (eTN) - Original and unique global international news with a focus on travel and tourism
thread.title: Aeromexico reports August 2015 traffic results

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Aeromexico reports August 2015 traffic results
text:
Aeromexico reports August 2015 traffic results   
Sep 05, 2015   
MEXICO CITY, Mexico - Grupo Aeromexico SAB de CV today reported August 2015 operational results. 
• Grupo Aeromexico transported 1 million 670 thousand passengers in August; a 7.1% year-on-year increase. International passenger numbers increased by 17.6%, while domestic passenger numbers increased by 2.2%. 
• Demand, measured in Revenue Passenger Kilometers (RPKs), increased by 10.1%, year-on-year. Aeromexico's capacity, measured in Available Seat Kilometers (ASKs), increased by 9.3% year-on-year. 
• Aeromexico's August load factor was 82.9%. 
August YTD August 2015 2014 Var 2015 2014 Var 
RPKs (itinerary + charter, millions) Domestic 959 939 2.1% 7,278 6,869 5.9% International 1,968 1,718 14.5% 14,197 12,336 15.1% Total 2,927 2,658 10.1% 21,475 19,206 11.8% 
ASKs (itinerary + charter, millions) Domestic 1,226 1,190 3.0% 9,320 8,805 5.9% International 2,310 2,046 12.9% 17,481 15,188 15.1% Total 3,536 3,236 9.3% 26,802 23,993 11.7% 
Load Factor (itinerary, %) p.p. p.p. Domestic 78.3 79.1 -0.8 78.2 78.2 -0.0 International 85.4 84.2 1.2 81.4 81.8 -0.4 Total 82.9 82.3 0.6 80.3 80.4 -0.2 
Passengers (itinerary + charter, thousands) Domestic 1,089 1,065 2.2% 8,371 7,860 6.5% International 581 494 17.6% 4,174 3,561 17.2% Total 1,670 1,560 7.1% 12,545 11,421 9.8%
